snippet: The United Automobile Workers has called on the league to collectively bargain any changes to its personal conduct policy.
abstract: NFL roundup; United Automobile Workers calls on NFL to collectively bargain any changes to its personal conduct policy following backlash related to Ray Rice domestic abuse case; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The United Automobile Workers has called on the league to collectively bargain any changes to its personal conduct policy.

headline.main: U.A.W. Urges N.F.L. to Bargain Changes
headline.print_headline: U.A.W. Urges League to Bargain Changes
